chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 m : Map bool), lem m0 m1 -> lem (dta_app_ne_aux d m0 m) (dta_app_ne_aux d m1 m)

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
dta_app_ne_aux = fix dta_app_ne_aux (d : preDTA) (m r : Map bool) {struct r} : Map bool := match d with | @M0 _ => M0 bool | @M1 _ a s => match r with | @M1 _ a' b => if (a =? a')%N then M1 bool a (b || st_non_empty m s) else M0 bool | _ => M0 bool end | @M2 _ d0 d1 => match r with | @M2 _ r0 r1 => M2 bool (dta_app_ne_aux d0 m r0) (dta_app_ne_aux d1 m r1) | _ => M0 bool end end : preDTA -> Map bool -> Map bool -> Map bool
dta_app_ne_inc_1 : forall (s : state) (m0 m1 : Map bool), lem m0 m1 -> leb (st_non_empty m0 s) (st_non_empty m1 s)
dta_app_ne_inc_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (m0 m1 : Map bool), lem m0 m1 -> leb (pl_non_empty m0 p) (pl_non_empty m1 p)
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
lem_domain_equal : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, lem m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 m1
dta_app_ne_aux_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool), def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne_aux d m)
domain_equal_symmetric : forall (A B : Set) (m0 : Map A) (m1 : Map B), domain_equal A B m0 m1 -> domain_equal B A m1 m0
lem_antisymmetric = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y x0 -> x0 = y) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = y0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => eq_refl) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (H : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) (_ : lem (M1 bool a a0) (M0 bool)) => False_ind (M0 bool = M1 bool a a0) H) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m -> lem m (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m) (m0 : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m0 -> lem m0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m0) (...
lem_transitive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y z : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y z -> lem x0 z) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => forall z : Map bool, lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 z -> lem (M0 bool) z) (fun z : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun z0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) -> lem (M0 bool) z0 -> lem (M0 bool) z0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => I) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool)) (H0 : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) => False_ind (lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) H0) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool)...
borne_1_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)
domain_equal_mapget : forall (A B : Set) (m0 : Map A) (m1 : Map B) (a : ad) (x : A), domain_equal A B m0 m1 -> MapGet A m0 a = Some x -> exists y : B, MapGet B m1 a = Some y
lattice_bounded_5 : forall (p : prechain bool) (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p)
lattice_bounded_10 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (p : prechain bool), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m) lem p -> chain_length bool p <= S (MapCard A m)
lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
signature.predta_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map state, signature.predta_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map state, signature.predta_compatible_compat_def m0 -> signature.predta_compatible_compat_def (M2 state m m0)
lattice_bounded_8 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), lattice_bounded_def_2 A m -> forall m0 : Map A, lattice_bounded_def_2 A m0 -> lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M2 A m m0)
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
lattice_bounded_2 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 (concat bool p m)
lattice_bounded_3 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (concat bool p m)
lattice_bounded_0 : forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (single bool m)
lattice_bounded_1 : forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 (single bool m)
lattice_bounded_def_1 = fun p : prechain bool => lattice_bounded_def_0 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (concat bool p m) : prechain bool -> Prop
dta_app_ne = fun (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) => dta_app_ne_aux d m m : preDTA -> Map bool -> Map bool
map_maxi_maxi : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), maxi bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_maxi A x)
map_mini_mini : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mini bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x)
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
invar_list = fun tl : term_list => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p tl n = true -> n <= m -> rec_list_terms d p tl m = true : term_list -> Prop
invar_term = fun t : term => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), rec_term d a t n = true -> n <= m -> rec_term d a t m = true : term -> Prop
lattice_bounded : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), bounded_sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A x) lem (S (MapCard A x))
mlattice : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mLattice bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x) (map_maxi A x)
prechain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
lem_order = conj lem_reflexive (conj lem_antisymmetric lem_transitive) : r_order bool lem
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> signature.pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
le_n_S : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> S n <= S m
borne_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state), state_in_dta d s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille d

```intros d m0 m1 H. unfold lem, dta_app_ne_aux. destruct d.
- destruct r.
  + intros. exact I.
  + intros. apply dta_app_ne_aux_def_ok.
- destruct r.
  + destruct r.
    * intros _. exact I.
    * intros. apply dta_app_ne_inc_0. exact H.
  + intros. apply dta_app_ne_inc_1. exact H.
```
